Posts.Content: May 14, 2013 01:06PM Elaine1955 wrote: Yes.  My surgeon was Kristi Harrington!  She was the best.  She was also very direct  which is how I am. .  I had my operation 5 years ago .  A double Mast.  Her partner, Dr. Klarsfeld was great too.  Afterward, I decided to go to Swedish for my Oncologist, Dr. Ken Kraemer in Bellevue and Issaquah.
